sentence.Network_en: He was confirmed as a member of the Church of England.
sentence.Network_cn: 他领受了坚振礼，成为英国国教会的一员。

sentence.Network_en: Kaspar had spoken know-ledgeably about the state of agriculture in Europe.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡斯帕对欧洲农业状况发表了一番颇有见地的见解。

sentence.Network_en: The building he was lodged in turned out to be a church.
sentence.Network_cn: 原来，他租住的那栋建筑是一座教堂。

list.abs: the Tang Dynasty was an important age when Taoism became prosperous in history and rose from a folk church to state church and when it exerted great influence on the Tang society .唐代是道教史上的兴盛发展时期，也是道教从民间宗教跃升为国家宗教，并对唐代社会产生影响的重要时期。
the separation of church and state was achieved about a hundred years ago ., 政教分离 , 是大约一百年前的事.
breaches the figurative wall separating church and state ., 打破了区分教堂和国家的精神界碑.
...四九年政权替换前后，佛教法师的处境与艰难，也就是从政教关系（church-state relationship）的角度观察，才不会因主观的感情与 …
... church oreder 教秩 church state 梵蒂冈国 church sturctures 教会结构.

means.word_mean: 1. a state ruled by religious authority
